projects.title: MBTA Arrival Predictions
projects.headline: Predicts when the next train arrives at a selected stop on the MBTA subway system through calls to the MBTA API
projects.software: JavaScript, TypeScript, Svelte, HTML/CSS, Rollup, Vercel, MBTA API v3

projects.title: hatsunem.icu
projects.headline: Loads a random youtube video from a curated playlist of songs featuring Vocaloid Hatsune Miku
projects.software: Python, Flask, HTML/CSS, gunicorn, Heroku, Youtube API

projects.title: Simple Movie Search
projects.headline: Search for movie titles and browse a list of results
